message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can adjust in the next rounds.
I propose a more equitable split where I get 55% and you get 45%. This is much fairer than your initial offer and accounts for the fact that I'm facing inflation penalties with each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give away more than 40%. Let's meet in the middle.
